edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.prog_assgmnt_team

Class Shadow

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.prog_assgmnt_team.GUIEntity
      • edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.prog_assgmnt_team.Shadow

  • public class Shadow
extends GUIEntity
    This class creates the animated shadow used in GUI. It keeps track of the frame the shadow is at as well as the location of where to be drawn.

      • reveal

        public boolean reveal(long delta)
        Changes the sprite to show the tile below.
        Parameters:
        delta - time between displayed image.
        Returns:
        returns value if sprite has finished changing to full revealed.

      • hide

        public boolean hide(long delta)
        Changes sprite to hide the tile.
        Parameters:
        delta - time between displayed image.
        Returns:
        returns true when sprite is on frame 0.
